text:
@WhiteHouse We look forward to seeing #PresidentPlump in a house of worship without his mask.

I don't know any clergy who are in a hurry to re-open their congregations to public gatherings given a desire to protect their flocks from death by the COVID-19 virus and funeral services via Zoom. https://t.co/iPN9kgj1VJ
